title: Life Changes
description: Ryan was changed after the vicious beating & torture. He had been left for dead- for days.When he called his old friend Shari to help him recover, he should have known...But neither of them expected to find his ex-lover Spike, floating face down in the swimming pool. It was almost more than he could take. The cops put the mansion on lock-down. In a household of murder suspects, is it possible to find love and happiness?
author: Kathleen Patel
